definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: Desalting of crude oil consumes huge quantity of fresh water.
sentences.chinese: 原油脱盐要消耗大量的新鲜水。

sentences.english: Clean ballast tanks are dedicated to ballasting operations and their contents are not mixed with fuel or oil.
sentences.chinese: 意思就是不装燃油或者原油的专用压在舱。

sentences.english: In another month, Sino-Russian crude oil pipeline will officially supply oil.
sentences.chinese: 再过一个多月，中俄原油管道将正式供油。

sentences.english: China sold $325.8 million of crude oil to North Korea last year, up 37 percent from 2009.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜去年向中国购买物资中，原油占最多。

sentences.english: Macao beach facilities, power plants and oil storage tank anti-corrosion.
sentences.chinese: 澳门电厂海边设施及原油储油罐防腐。

sentences.english: Who has presided over an oil-driven bonanza for his country.
sentences.chinese: 他曾为自己的国家赢得了一笔受原油驱使的巨大财富。

sentences.english: Oil pump units are the key instruments in crude oil transportation system.
sentences.chinese: 输油泵机组是原油集输系统的关键设备。

sentences.english: The first of what would turn out to be 10.8 million gal. of oil began to spew forth into the cold waters.
sentences.chinese: 1080万加仑的原油喷涌到冰冷的海水中。

sentences.english: Sanshui's crude oil in the east of South China Sea has been evaluated.
sentences.chinese: 对南海东部三水原油进行初步评价。

sentences.english: Instead, just deploy an army of autonomous, oil-scrubbing robots.
sentences.chinese: 相反，只需要部署一支自主的原油擦洗机器人小分队。

sentences.english: The hydrogeologic situation and the distribution of major oil region in Zhongyuan Oilfield are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了中原油田的水文地质概况及主要油区的分布。

sentences.english: Iraq's self-ruled Kurdish region has started exporting crude oil for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉克库尔德自治区开始首次出口原油。

sentences.english: The other one comes mainly from Fengcheng group source rocks of Permian.
sentences.chinese: 第二类原油主要来源于二叠系风城组烃源岩。

sentences.english: The oil from Kongdian Formation is immature crude oil.
Chonggao crude oil fell yesterday, the US-led rebound stabilized.
sentences.chinese: 昨日原油冲高回落，带动美豆止跌反弹。

sentences.english: Beam pumping units have widely been used in oil fields.
sentences.chinese: 原油生产中普遍使用游梁式抽油机。

definition: OPEC/Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries
in a few days/one of these days
bull market (prices appear to be rising)
poor prospects in the short term (finance)
many-headed/many-layered (authority)/devolved (as opposed to centralized)/pluralistic/(as classifier) number of animals/long term (finance)/long (investment)
to continue to fall (of share prices)
market price/quotation of market price/the current market situation
good prospects in the short term (finance)
